IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: EDUCATIONAL, CLINICAL AND RESIDENTIAL SERVICES FOR DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED ADULTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: EDUCATIONAL, CLINICAL AND RESIDENTIAL SERVICES FOR DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED ADULTS.
IRS990.Description: RESIDENTIAL ICF - PROVIDED INTERMEDIATE CARE FACILITIES FOR THE HANDICAPPED.

Activity2.Description: RESIDENTIAL COMMUNITY RESIDENCE - PROVIDED RESIDENTIAL SERVICES TO THE HANDICAPPED.

Activity3.Description: MEDICAID WAIVER PROGRAM - ESTABLISHED BY NEW YORK STATE TO CHANGE THE METHOD OF PAYMENT FOR VARIOUS SERVICES SUCH AS IN-HOUSE RESIDENTIAL HABILITATION AND FAMILY CARE.

ActivityOther.Description: OPTIONS FOR PEOPLE THROUGH SERVICES "OPTS" PROGRAM, WHICH BLENDS DAY SERVICE OPPORTUNITIES, SUCH AS DAY HABILITATION, PREVOCATIONAL SERVICES, SUPPORTIVE EMPLOYMENTS, AND CENTER-BASED ACTIVITIES, IN ORDER TO PROVIDE DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED INDIVIDUALS WITH THE GREATEST FLEXIBILITY IN CHOOSING THEIR CARE. THE OPTS PROGRAM REPLACED THE DAY TREATMENT PROGRAM. FAMILY SUPPORT GRANTS; DAY CARE - PROVIDED FUNDS TO PERFORM SERVICES AND OPERATE TREATMENT PROGRAMS FOR THE HANDICAPPED. TRANSPORTATION OF CLIENTS AND RESIDENTS FROM GROUP HOMES TO TREATMENT CENTERS AND HOSPITALS.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: OPTIONS FOR PEOPLE THROUGH SERVICES "OPTS" PROGRAM, WHICH BLENDS DAY SERVICE OPPORTUNITIES, SUCH AS DAY HABILITATION, PREVOCATIONAL SERVICES, SUPPORTIVE EMPLOYMENTS, AND CENTER-BASED ACTIVITIES, IN ORDER TO PROVIDE DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED INDIVIDUALS WITH THE GREATEST FLEXIBILITY IN CHOOSING THEIR CARE. THE OPTS PROGRAM REPLACED THE DAY TREATMENT PROGRAM. FAMILY SUPPORT GRANTS; DAY CARE - PROVIDED FUNDS TO PERFORM SERVICES AND OPERATE TREATMENT PROGRAMS FOR THE HANDICAPPED. TRANSPORTATION OF CLIENTS AND RESIDENTS FROM GROUP HOMES TO TREATMENT CENTERS AND HOSPITALS.
TO ENSURE THEIR OPERATIONS ARE CONSISTENT WITH THOSE OF THE ORGANIZATION THE ORGANIZATION HAS WRITTEN POLICIES AND PROCEDURES GOVERNING THE ACTIVITIES OF SUCH CHAPTERS, AFFILIATES, AND BRANCHES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: COPY OF FORM 990 WAS PROVIDED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BODY BEFORE IT WAS FILED.
THE ORGANIZATION REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITOR'S AND ENFORCE'S COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES ARE SIGNED.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE AND CONTRACTS.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE AND CONTRACTS.
NO DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC
